constraints.name: frequency_bound
constraints.description: 每个元素在每个序列中的出现次数不超过 K
constraints.formal: ∀i, count(x_i in deck1) ≤ K ∧ count(x_i in deck2) ≤ K

constraints.name: pairwise_matching
constraints.description: 两个序列中相同位置的元素相同时，可以进行匹配并得分
constraints.formal: if deck1[i] == deck2[j], then (i, j) can be matched and score += 1
